section.title: Installing Alpha Anywhere
section.description: The person who installs Alpha Anywhere must have administrator rights. Users of Alpha Anywhere do not require administrator rights.Alpha Anywhere is a relational database management system for entering, processing, and outputting information. Alpha Anywhere provides you with a rich environment to easily create sophisticated databases and design efficient methods for data entry and output.
The Welcome to Alpha Anywhere screen lets you choose a way to get started quickly using Alpha Anywhere. Select an option and click OK.
section.note: To prevent the Welcome to Alpha Five screen from appearing again, select Do not show this dialog box again.
